meanings: (광선) light, ray, gleam; (반짝이는) twinkle; (희미한) glimmer; (불빛) glow, beam, flash
(인상, 기색) look, sign, air, gleam; (안색) complexion, color

vlive.korean: 나의 세상 나의 빛 몰라? You don't know my world and my light? 듣기 View video IZ*ONE : 🍯💧즈 왔어용~☔️
vlive.english: You don't know my world and my light?

vlive.english: Vote. - Didn't it look brighter when it was tilted up?

examples.korean: The earth is illuminated by the sun. 발음듣기 지구는 태양의 빛을 받는다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The earth is illuminated by the sun. 발음

examples.korean: A pink flush spread over his cheeks. 발음듣기 그의 두 뺨에 분홍빛 홍조가 번졌다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A pink flush spread over his cheeks. 발음

examples.korean: I shielded my eyes against the glare. 발음듣기 나는 그 눈부신 빛에 내 눈을 가렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: I shielded my eyes against the glare. 발음

examples.korean: A cold grey light crept under the curtains. 발음듣기 커튼 아래로 차가운 회색 빛 한 줄기가 새어 나왔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: A cold grey light crept under the curtains. 발음

examples.korean: We were spooked by the strange noises and lights. 발음듣기 우리는 이상한 소리와 빛 때문에 겁을 집어먹었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: We were spooked by the strange noises and lights. 발음
